name: Query Chan in Spaceland
description:
Help Query Chan get her spaceship back!

Find the Key to unlock the gate where your ship is held hostage!

Collect batteries for fun!

Jump on Robo-Guards to squish them!

Collect hearts if your health is low!

The glowing light post are Checkpoints, if you die you respawn at the last one you touched!

Use arrow keys / WSAD to move around!

Use space bar to jump!

Use the Q key to rotate camera left!

Use the E key to rotate camera right!

Use Escape key to Pause Game!

Made for the GamesPlusJam2!

Unity Asset Store Assets used:

Unity Game Jam Main Menu - Free

Query Chan SD - Free

Platformer 3D Project (old Unity 2 / 3 project) - Free / Depreciated

Sky FX pack - Free

Super World Game Kit - Depreciated

Thanks for Playing!

Made with Unity 5.4.2.f.2
